projects.title: First Chair America
projects.description: Full-stack student registration platform with serverless AWS backend
details: Processed 500+ registrations with Lambda APIs and DynamoDB single-table design
Reduced admin workload 60% with HMAC-signed auth and React + Chakra dashboards
Automated certificate generation with pdf-lib and S3/SES notifications
projects.tech: React, AWS Lambda, DynamoDB, S3, Cognito, Amplify

projects.title: National Scholastic Musician Awards
projects.description: Angular SPA with real-time assessments and payment processing
details: Built app supporting 200+ concurrent users with lazy routes and AppSync GraphQL
Processed $10K+ in payments through timed assessment engine with Stripe
Implemented Cognito auth with real-time DataStore sync
projects.tech: Angular, AWS Amplify, AppSync, GraphQL, Stripe, Cognito

projects.title: Multimedia Misogyny Detection
projects.description: AI-powered content moderation system for social media
details: Built classifier achieving 89.36% accuracy for content moderation
Implemented data pipelines and model monitoring
projects.tech: Python, NLP, Machine Learning, Computer Vision
